short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick price calculation when buying christmas shirts
short.vi: Tính giá nhanh khi mua christmas shirts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You want to buy a nice Christmas T-shirt to go out for the Christmas season but don't know where to look?.
Need advice on price before buying for yourself?.
With the most likely to christmas shirts application on chrome extension will help you:
- See the samples that peanutstee is having.
- View the price list of each product based on the quantity you want with just a few clicks

User manual:
Step 1: Install the app as usual.
Step 2: Click on the icon of the application.
Step 3: Choose the type of shirt you want
Step 4: Choose quantity.
Step 5: Click on calculate and see the result.

Contact to get quick feedback on peanutstee's application at:
- Address: 64 Grove Ave Salem, NH United States
- Email: support@peanutstee.com
- Phone number: +1 262-865-2826
Website: https://peanutstee.com/
